product_series.name: NOVA Series
product_series.description: NOVA系列代表了智能电子烟的未来，采用最先进的SMARTCORE 3.0芯片，提供精准的功率控制和智能化的使用体验。每个产品都经过精心设计，将科技与完美融合。
product_series.seo_description: Discover NOVA Series - the future of smart vaping with advanced technology and innovative design.

product_series.name: STRIKE Series
product_series.description: STRIKE系列为追求极致性能的用户而生。无论是超大功率输出还是精准的温控体验，STRIKE都能满足您对专业级电子烟设备的所有期待。
product_series.seo_description: STRIKE Series delivers unmatched power and precision for professional vaping enthusiasts.

product_series.name: FLO Series
product_series.description: FLO系列专注于轻薄便携的设计理念，让电子烟成为您旅途中的完美伴侣。极致纤薄的机身，持久续航的电池，随时随地享受纯净的 vaping 体验。
product_series.seo_title: FLO Series - Light Up Your Journey
product_series.seo_description: FLO Series offers ultra-portable vaping devices designed for your on-the-go lifestyle.

product_series.name: EVO Series
product_series.description: EVO系列象征着电子烟技术的不断进化。通过持续的创新和优化，EVO系列产品在性能、便携性和用户体验之间找到了完美的平衡点。
product_series.seo_description: EVO Series represents the continuous evolution of vaping technology and innovation.
